content.detailedDescription:
4 of the staff were outside looking up towards se- i went towards them it was approx 0530 am end dec 2014 singapore- when i looked up they were easily 2-4  miles over the clouds- after 2-3 minutes i was aware i had seen these same type objects- up close in the late 70's 
from this instance- the pulsation was what reminded me of the previous event- the irregular flight and change of courses were pronounced

after 10 further minutes- the cloud cover obscured the view- i was quite calm- i understand flight and technologies very keenly,
content.summary: The pulsation was between 2-3 craft with slow but completely irregular changes in direction

content.detailedDescription: On july 14, 2014 at about 3:00am in lasvegas, nevada, i was walking to my car from a nightclub. i was standing in front of the tropicana hotel and looked up for some reason towards the moon which was peaking out from a sky full of clouds. i saw four circular green lights flying in and out of the clouds above. three seemed to be in a triangular pattern while one trailed behind. i watched for about a minute or two before i pulled out my iphone 5 and started to record what i was seeing. the lights changed color to more of a orange color and kept flying with the triangle pattern seeming to get bigger and smaller. i remember my eyes seeing so much more than what the video on my phone was getting. i wish i had a better video camera but assume you guys have better technology to take my video and pull in more focus of what i got on my phone. as i uploaded this video on my computer it's very hard to make out what on my phone is more clearer. the lights seem to disappear in the clouds and so i got in my car and called my girlfriend to let her know what i had just seen. typically airplanes and helicopters have two or three different lights and i see them everyday from the busy las vegas airport. these lights where completely different and went from one solid color to another with a flying pattern like a few flies.
content.summary: Ufo's under the vegas moon

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my vehicle heading south on sunday june 6th 2015 at approximately 5;30pm. while stopping at a red light, i observed a metallic, disc shaped craft hovering in the sky approximately 45 degrees from the horizon. the craft was a saucer/disc shaped and metallic or metal in color. the object reflected sunlight just as an airplane does. it hovered in the same place for several seconds, than moved in a straight path towards the south for another several seconds. the craft than disappeared from sight. there was a small cloud in the craft's path so i first thought it had disappeared behind the small cloud, but the craft never re appeared and the cloud was in fact smaller than the craft itself. i am not a good judge in distance so i would rather not guess. but the craft was approximately at 45 degrees from the horizon and it's apparent size was that of a basketball. it makes sense to me that the craft either changed it's direction abruptly, ascended abruptly, or disappeared all together but i cannot be sure because it just disappeared. there was only one small cloud in its path and this cloud was not large enough to conceal the whole craft. i immediately recognized that this craft was not an airplane nor a helicopter. i have never observed an unidentified flying object before but i am absolutely 100% sure that 1) the object was metallic/metal in color, 2) the object was disc/saucer shaped. 3) this object was not an airplane, helicopter, or ballon. this object had no wings. i cannot be sure of the object's actual size, but it is in opinion that it is significantly larger than normal aircraft. this object was definitely solid and metal.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Metallic, disc shaped craft hovers, than moves south, than disappears

content.detailedDescription: In mid conversation, i noticed a string of very large looking, very bright, redish/orangish lights appear one after another totally in about 5, maybe 6. they appeared on after another, but quickly. from my left to right. then they went out. then what followed were random individual lights going on and then off in the area, but not the same spot. then nothing. just regular black night. i don't know how to describe it. it was fleeting. but bizarre.
content.summary: String of almost flickering red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house then my phone stopped working then i looked up and there was this big object hovering over me and i couldn't move or take my eyes off it then about two minutes later some force pushed me down then it took off to a star in the sky in seconds.
content.summary: I was walking home then i saw this big object with strange lights just hovering from about 2 minutes then shot of to a star in seconds

content.detailedDescription: About three or four years ago, my step brother and i were camping at red river gorge in ky and we were just looking up in the sky at the thousands of stars because us city boys don't see that kind of sky very often. we had just cracked open our first beers so we were not drunk (we know what we saw!!!) we noticed that directly above us, but way way up in the air was three bright blue hovering lights in a perfect iscoceles (or however you spell it) triangle. it had to have been only one object because the lights were hovering around perfectly uniform and we were staring at the ufo for a couple minutes in shock and all of a sudden it took off at a supersonic speed in one direction and was gone in less than 2 seconds! i repeat we know what we saw and i will never forget this experience!!!
content.summary: Step brother and i both saw three bright blue lights hovering way up in the air directly above us then the ufo just flew away at a crazy speed in one direction

content.detailedDescription: i witnessed an orange glowing and pulsating ball of light. it was flying lower on the horizon coming from the east. it made a gradual turn that started heading north in the sky. but then started ascending, until it disappeared into the night sky.
content.summary: Orange pulsing ball of light, no sound

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were walking outside around 9:30 p.M. on june 9, 2015 in league city.  i looked up at the sky and asked him if that was the north star, he said no.  i said omg, that looks like a ufo.  i went back in the house and got my binocs and we both looked at it in amazement.  i have never seen anything like it.  it was bouncing around and it seemed to emit something from the sides and the bottom.  my neighbor was in his garage and we called him over to take a look.  he agreed that it must be a ufo.  he has never seen anything like it either.  i called the local police to see if anyone else reported something strange in the sky.  they said no.  i told them they need to go an look.  i had two police officers come to my house and looked through the binocs and were as awe-struck as we were.  they agreed it was something out of the norm.  my son and i were very upset by what we saw and could not get any answers as to what it was.  i have never seen anything like it.  my son video taped it and also took pictures.  we lost sight of it as it descended in the sky beyond the tree line.  my son  took the attached pictures.  i believe he has a video as well.  as far as time zone, we are on the gulf coast.
content.summary: Very bright and glowng white, shape moving up and down

content.detailedDescription: On a nice eve i sit outdoors. i look skyward n i always see blinking lights. last nite was no different. i felt as if to look really high in the sky at the little dipper or big dipper i get them confused. . and noticed an odd blinking of lights. so i waved at the lights,  they seemed to become very bright.  i felt it was in aknowledgement of my wave. as i see them all the  time. it was really bright n i asked if it could change to blue or pink n it did... as i took a series of pics, i found it really got bright than dimmed again.  i waved as i always do n blow them a kiss n say thank u. strange as this may sound they respond...N i went indoors. sat down used photoshopped express. i use clarity n to sharpen the pic n show exactly what is there in the photos i  add nothing...N this is fascinating what was there this time... i do this all the time n when i sense them i get an inner tremor. also this may sound strange as well. i feel like almost a morse code sound in my left ear only , that has been recen .  i know when they r there n when they r not.  n believe me they r almost always there.  last night was weird due to almost  having the urge to look straight up...Head bent back up... way up. different... i would like to add these are always taken on my cellphone samsung s4.
content.summary: No matter where u go i have the urge to look up. they flash lights i wave n take pics. all the time

content.detailedDescription:
Been watching these lights since 1995, every clear night i am out there watching them. if its winter i do not watch them. only nice clear nights, some of the things above need to allow you to check several boxes. like direction they came from.
i have been trying to get someone to come and investigate these lights for many years now.So far no one has shown any interest at all. 

1995 was my first sighting was in a small town called goree texas. my brother and i was out sitting on the tailgate of his truck we both noticed these lights about the same time.. looked like two stars one behind the other. no blinking lights. we watched them for a couple of minutes then they disappeared,poof gone. we both looked at each other in awww. so a week or 2 later i was outside just after the sun went down stars were just starting to come out. i noticed another light like the ones we saw earlier. so i stood outside for a couple of hours and seen well over 20 of these lights. some are in out atmosphere and some look as though they are way out in space. most you will see from the north to south and vise versa, the most ever seen coming from the east is 3, most of the time it's just 2 but every now and then i see 3. you never ever see them come from the east. most are going very slow, lights get bright and dim this may happen all the way across the sky from n-s-s-n once in a while i see one doing a very high rate of speed. one i seen had to be doing 4-5k miles an hour. crossed the entire sky in about 3 minutes or less. 
the most i have ever seen is 36 in one night. some night they are very few. usually 10-20. you will only see them from about dusk just after the stars start coming out until (last night was 11:16) was the last one. then weeee hours of the morning about 1hr 45 minutes to 2 hours before daylight. after 11 or so you do not see them any more until the weee hrs of the morning. i have seen a few sit stationary in one spot a light blinks every 32-3 minutes. the lowest one i have seen might have been 500 feet in the air give or take. it was on the forth of july and it was not  a fire work.
i have shown these lights to a few friends. they to are unsure what they are. 
i see it this way, if i see say 30 or so in the sky over my area just how many are around the entire globe. they are here!! 
if anyone other than mufon want to see these i can show you how to spot them, if you do not know what you are looking for you will just say oh that's a plane, wrong!!!
 i'm not allowed to give my contact info on here or i would . i want the world to know they are out there what ever they are!!
you just have to come and let me show you mufon!!!! seriously!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Have been watching them since 1995, want to see what i see?

content.detailedDescription: It was not witnessed by me, but friends of mine who wish to remain anonymous. i do have a picture that closely resembles what they claim to have seen. it looked like a cloud at first, but its appearance was circular and disappeared before there eyes. me, myself personally; i'm not to sure what they actually saw, but one of them told me that it was okay to give y'all their number, if y'all are interested in contacting them. one of my friends, who witnessed this can give you further information; than what i provided for y'all. i'm not to sure of what actually happened. but, i will provide y'all with as much information i can. my number is on the contact information that i provided and so is my e-mail as well. i'm hoping that we might be onto something, but that is for y'all to confirm or deny. also, i'm into alien conspiracy theories; as well as, ancient alien theories. i hope to hear from y'all soon and from there we can discuss this matter further. i'm not doing this as a joke or to get attention. i'm doing this to prove my friend is telling the truth and that there is more to this than we thought possible. it might play in to what i've been speculating, but as i said before we can discuss this matter further in person. ty, and have a great day.
content.summary: Looked like a cloud, but different in appearance to other clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south, on hwy 17-92 as i approached the davenport sand mine i observed 3 yellow orange lights in the south eastern sky. i tried to find a location so i could get a better view. as i proceeded another group of 3 lights appeared. i proceeded to the davenport baseball field. i saw only one group of lights i was able to video this group as it moved farther south and winked out.
content.summary: Observed 3 lights in the south east.

content.detailedDescription:
Where: our backyard, 3-miles north from an airforce base.  the tripod/camera setup was specifically aimed uap imaging. 

i first noticed through the camera's viewfinder a tiny white dot at a luminosity of >220 level of photoshop brightness (out of 255) and brighter in the images than in the clouds (<190 brightness).  it was a small neutral white dot/oval next to a cloud.

what? i see uap's frequently along the east to west commercial flightpath over our home and as well as in a north-south direction from the airforce base to the south. some are red-orange (at night), while others are white. there were no wings, no sound, no landing lights and no strobes, and no trail.

the object's motion appeared constant as it headed east, speed unknown.

the object then disappeared behind trees.
content.summary: A bright white oval object near cloud moved eastward

content.detailedDescription: Fleet of ufos with 100 travel in speed of wind,tonight!
content.summary: Fleet of ufos with 100 travel in speed of wind

content.detailedDescription:
At home, 7 p.M. on friday, june 5.  my husband was doing yard work so i walked around looking at the clouds.  for a couple of weeks now, the clouds have been looking really strange.  they are very feathery, which is not really unusual, but the cloud cover typically forms these patterns after i see planes/chemtrails (still don't know if i buy into this theory, but after this sighting, i'm not sure).

like i said, the clouds were really feathery, except some in the distance, and one in particular.  it had a grey tone to it and was round, like one would expect a small storm cloud to look, except it was too small to be that.  something told me to take a picture of it.  i positioned my iphone 6 in that direction and watched my viewfinder as the camera focused and snapped.  when the photo snapped, i noticed, what looked like a pixel on my screen, flash.  immediately i reviewed the picture, not believing what i had just saw, and, sure enough, there was a craft.  i watched for another 5 minutes, taking pictures of this cloud moving closer to my position.  it scared me.  i felt like it knew i saw it and was coming to check me out.

i went into the house to use the restroom and make another cup of coffee.  approximately 4 minutes passed and i returned to the front porch.  the cloud was gone, completely.  what remained were the large, whispy, feathery clouds that never moved.  in midland, friday evening, we were under a wind advisory.  the wind was blowing 20+ mph, i believe i read, but the only cloud that moved was this one.

additionally, over the remainder of what looked like the city of midland, was another feathery cloud, except when i looked up at it, it seemed to be fake.  it was very thick and had a yellow haze to it.  it also seemed relatively low to the ground, like i could climb a tall building and touch it.  the photos i took didn't show the hazy effect, but you can see the "structure" (lines that look like vertebrae & ribs) these feathery clouds form.  i'm seeing them (clouds) all of the time over the last couple of weeks.

exact positions and distance from me are unknown.  i'm no good determining distance like that.  plus, it's west texas, so there aren't really any good reference points because of the desert environment.

i have other pictures of the cloud moving as well as a video, but none of them show any other objects, that i can see.
content.summary: Cloud watching - took pictures

content.detailedDescription: This event was observed during a storm and i have video of a bright light
content.summary: Bright light is sky at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family was in our backyard enjoying the afternoon when my grandson said look grandpa there's a eagle. i looked up and saw a eagle soaring what look like about a 1000ft in the air. we watched the eagle soar for a while when i spotted a 2nd eagle even higher in the air. i showed my grandson where to look and then i saw a very bright object above the 2nd eagle, it was round in appearance. flying from directly over my head at a very high altitude heading south. me and my grandson both watched it for about a minute before it disappeared in the distant. 20 minutes later the object came back heading north in the same path it had come . this time it was a lot lower in altitude i estimate about 2000 or 3000 ft above the ground. it traveled north and stopped and hovered, south of me. from my angle it appeared to be at about a 40 degree angle. the object stopped and hovered for about 1 minute and a second object appeared coming from the south. it headed north and stopped next to the first object side by side. they were hovering for about a minute when the one on the left started to travel southeast. the other headed south. during this time i took several pictures with my phone and camera. when both objects had left about 10 minutes later i saw a 3rd object this one a lot lower in altitude heading south a very fast pace. i observed the third object with binoculars and it appeared to be silver in color reflecting the evening sun. it travelled at fast rate and was out of sight in about 15 seconds.
content.summary: Traveled from north heading south, stopped hovered and returned northward and stopped and hovered. than headed south again

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Hello, i am reporting this sighting for my sister and her boss. last night (june 9th, 10pm, 2015) four white/pink starlike objects in formation were sighted above wheatley,ont for about three hours. three forming a triangle and the fourth leading. the leading object was the most active, making weaving and figure eight maneuvers. these objects had a physical effect on the surrounding clouds, forming a circle of clear space around the formation. some time after the sighting, a radio station in london,ont (london's best rock fm96) shared a listeners post on facebook, featuring two photographs of the same formation over london. only three of the four objects were sighted at this time.
content.summary: 4 objects in formation, 4th (leading) doing figure eight maneuvers, effected clouds

content.detailedDescription: I have been looking up in the sky ever since i can remember... nightly routine since i have always refused to believe our society is true meaning of life it's just never been enough and i always felt like were so much more... last night i'm sitting on my bench in the backyard with my bunny and 2 chihuahuas looking up always only seen all kinds of planes which to me have always looked crazy like omg planes flyng in the air its crazy to me ... not last night !!! i looked to my left and suddenly this huge bright white light appeared!!! about 7-10 times bigger than how big the air planes look like from my view and it had grown from this little light to huge in less than a second!!! then it started traveling to the left so fast it went from huge circle to a "line" shape of bright light and dissapeared !!! this was a few seconds no more than 5 seconds duration i stayed there 2 more hours until 2 am and nothing came back or appeared i had a ufo dream for the first time in my life 3 weeks ago and it was pretty real and intense all the ufo's coming at the same time and i'm just so freakin' happy that what i saw had nothing to do with me i have no idea what i would do if i saw an air craft just hovering over me or saw an alien i have always believed and felt something even without seeing shows reading books knowing nothing i just always knew they existed but im thankful that's all i have to report i have a 1 year old and a 4 year old and i just want us safe and if someone were to appear again and show him/herself to me i freakin hope its benevolent and help change our lives for the good but i live in a city where it's not a hot spot so it makes me wonder alot ... i did hear about the 1970's when a helicpopter reported the light following them up in the air in glendale and they called the bob hope airport and there was nothing on the radar ... well this is the same kind of light!! only white!!! like an led white light and when it dissapeared to my left .. it was heading towards the direction of bob hope airport i didnt tell anyone my boyfriend and friends shush me theyre to busy with society bs to care about real life like this!!!!
content.summary: I've watched stars since age 6 theyre beautiful last night my nightly routine i saw a bright white ball appear it was bigger than airplanes by 7x it headed towards my left turned into a sort of

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving se when we both saw a blue-green ball of light slowly descended towards the ground. we were approximately 60 feet away from it. the sky was clear of clouds and there were no aircraft in the area. we very seldom see any planes in our area. the sphere slowly came to a stop right before it hit the ground and then it just disappeared. we did not stop to check it out. when i think about it, we should have stopped and went looking for it. but we just kept on driving home and we remained silent. i asked my girlfriend if she just saw what i saw and she said "yes".
content.summary: Pulsating ball of teal color slowly descended to ground and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
At 3:50 on june 3rd. i was sitting on my front porch watching a bird and i noticed a cigar shape in the sky. i had my cell phone in hand and was able to snap 3 photos in a few seconds 

i really thought it was an airplane - still may be - but i did not notice any wing structures or tail structure on the item. it moved from the north to the south in a straight line very fast 

i just could not believe what i just witnessed. it either went into a cloud or disappeared.
content.summary: Sitting on my front porch - i noticed an object in the sky to my left while watching a bird

content.detailedDescription:
Between 7:30 and 8:00 am, june 9th i observed six round shinny objects tree top level to the north and east of lincoln airport.  these objects moved higher in altitude and in the westerly direction.  they formed three groups of two.  they appeared to hover for a short time.  while hovering the middle group of two split into three objects. the groups then moved in a southeasterly direction.  a helicopter was also observed for a short time.

the closest military base confirmed no radar images or ballon launches.

on june 10th around 11:00am a group of four apache attack helicopters were seen in the area.

i have video but unable to attach to report.
content.summary: Six objects appeared on north horizon. observed objects move into three groups of two. middle group became three.  moved west then southeast gaining altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed this many times. star like object but it acted strange. it seemed to dip and it gets real bright then less bright, almost flashing. gets brighter as it dips through the sky. crossed the entire sky in less than a minute. the first few times i saw these i thought they were a star that got bright and flashed out but since then i have been keeping my binoculars and found that they keep going after they get real bright.
content.summary: Light in the upper atmosphere or higher.

content.detailedDescription: On june 5th beginning at 12:16 am, the third siting of the "trilogy" occurred. at that time two crafts appeared from the west, the portal of entry and proceeded to go northward slowly at first. these two craft were perpendicular to one another, angled at approximately 35 to 55 degrees from one another. they appeared to be small rectangles because their lights, which were flashing white and red, were not coming from the same spot but rather slightly apart. in the dark it appeared to be small rectangles but i cannot be 100 percent sure. as they moved to the north these two crafts made a maneuver where by the ship that was higher than the other went lower and the lower craft went higher; much higher. now the lower craft continued further north and the higher craft remained closer but they were still in contact with each other, flashing their lights seemingly communicating to one another. they then seem to have stopped moving, hovering in their positions when at 12:26am the "star like" came from the north positioning itself close to me and eyewitness about 4 degrees west of true north and completely stopped as if looking right at me. it hovered in that position for about a minute before reversing its flight pattern returning back to the north past the ghost ranch and the two other craft following her and disappearing into the night. the whole event took about 15 minutes in duration.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 2 small rectangles flashing lights with one larger star craft joining in

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were sitting near the atlantic ocean and since i've never seen a moonrise over and ocean before we decided to set up my camera and wait for the moon to rise. once i have my camera set up i noticed in the sky and orange yellow flash in the sky i thought it was a falling star but it did not have a trail of light behind it. it just went in and out in different locations in the sky. a trail of light behind it. it just went in and out in different locations in the sky.I asked my wife if she was saying this to and she said yes and we sat in rochester for a good long time. (anout 20 min. ). i have a very expensive dsl our camera able to take lowlight pictures very well and i was not able to get anything it just did not want to show up on the colors spectrum. or whenever and however long enough court would email at red lights around it in a geometric pattern almost like it was signaling something. it seemed to blink a white line and then suddenly appear somewhere else in the sky i could not tell if there were more than one or if it was just one and if it was just craft then i have never seen anything move that fast or in such a fashion as what i have witnessed that night
content.summary: Oranges yellow lights in the sky about midway in the horizon. it's seem to be a falling star at first without a streaking trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was uploading my video on youtube at around 19:15,when i looked outside my window i saw an object which was blinking at the height of building, i thought it was aeroplane,when i observed it, it looked like a disk which was stationary & hovering, then it changed its path and went into clouds..I assumed it was watching me.. i stood up surprisingly as i was shocked & my heart started pumping faster.Then i told to my dad and he thought i had imagined it..But seriously it was terrifying experience!!
content.summary: First it looked like aeroplane. when i observed, it was in the shape of a disk. it was hovering and blinking at the height of a building. when i focused, it changed its path!

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house in the back yard and, unfortunately for the credibility of the sighting, we were drinking alcohol lightly for socialism. at approximately 12 midnight, my girlfriend stated to me that it was time to go home and go to sleep. we said our good-byes and headed out the gate and into the alley where she clumsily tripped and hit the ground, laughing. in a joking manner i joined her side and we lay there for maybe 10 seconds before i started to rise to help her back up. i was just about to extend my hands to her after wiping the dirt off my pants when she said "what's that?". confused, it took me maybe 2 seconds before i reacted to the question. i turned around and saw our friends still partying and nothing more. i panned my head to the right and down, back to where she was now sitting upright and followed the trajectory of where her finger was pointed. i realized she was pointing above them and as soon as i lifted my eyes i saw, right over the group of people we were just with, 3 dim white lights in a triangular positioning from one-another maybe 20 feet apart. my first thought was that it was simply geese, knowing that they take a v pattern in the sky as their preferred style of flight. within 5 seconds it became apparent that this was not geese. i was completely stunned. as it passed over a tree, which was 5-10 feet away from our friends, i noticed that as the lights(which if connected made a triangle in the sky)passed in front of stars and clouds beyond it in the distance that it obstructed and competlely blocked the view of anything between the lights. this indicated to me that there was indeed a body, or a mass of some kind, that connected all of these lights together as one solid object. the craft was no more than 35 feet in elevation and traveled at no more than 20-25 mph. it was 100% silent and not one person other than my self or my girlfriend had even come close to realizing it was there. we watched as it traveled for another 15-20 seconds off into the distance before the 3 lights finally disappeared from view behind a storage unit that lines the back yard of my friends house. the two of us were completely astonished and could only speculate as to what we had just witnessed. having had much more detailed sightings since then, i have become more adamant that this was not something we had seen because of our alcoholic intake, but was indeed a craft of some intelligent design and control. i am, however, very glad to report this to be my very 1st ufo encounter! ! ! =)
content.summary: 3 lights in traingular  positioning, moving slowly overhead until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my friends porch at approximately 5pm smoking a cigarette. his porch is more of a room, with glass windows on either side and the door to my left. i was initially watching the crows as they flew by approximately a mile away when i noticed the object. i concentrated on the object because i did not see wings flap, as were the rest of the crows and birds. having hundreds of possible night time sightings and 2 definite sightings inside the atmosphere, i considered it to be a possible 
ufo and was excited, but remained silent amongst my peers until i had more of an idea of what it was. i watched it for maybe a minute before i got up, went out the door and down the stairs to the front lawn. from there, i watched the black dot travel at approximately 30-40 mph ne at what i estimate to be a half mile altitude for another 30 seconds to 1 minute. at this point it stopped it's ne trajectory and gained altitude at a considerable, but not inconceivable, rate of speed. this could be visualized as a balloon floating into the sky, only much quicker. my friend had called from within the room we were smoking in and asked what [item moved/cms/nd] i was doing. i explained and he, who has on multiple occasions witnessed these sort of events with me, quickly joined my side. within 10 seconds it had hit the low part of the clouds and it stopped moving altogether. i strategically used this as a place marker to get an approximate distance of the object, which also helped correlate the objects size and speed. i was certain by now that this was a craft with intelligent control behind it, and most certainly was nothing that the public has been made aware of. instantly i became ecstatic fore i had never had a sighting in broad day light and often verbalized how badly i had wanted to. it sat in position for what i recall to be 1-2 minutes and i was now ushering the rest of my peers to come join in this spectacular event. within this time it had done some things which i must choose precise words to describe. first it started to sporadically, but very rapidly, disappear and reappear. i estimate it did this 7-13 times within 5 seconds. maybe 20-30 seconds after this happened it started to do the same thing, only this time it was projecting an intense white light, not concentrated but more that of a flash light you are looking directly into. once it started to move again it was approximately the same speed as before except it was moving s-sw, still right below the clouds. i watched it from here for maybe another minute before the reflection from the clouds no longer allowed me to keep my eyes open, let alone elevated upwards. i could not stop describing what it had been doing for more than a breath, i couldn't help myself but to repeat over and over. by the time i recovered and had gotten glasses and binoculars, the craft had completely disappeared or i simply could not find it in the sky.
content.summary: Black dot in sky. traveled ne, elevated to clouds then headed s-sw.

content.detailedDescription: Hello i would like to report what i saw this morning as i was driving home from picking up my daughter from a friend's house. we were driving home at 1205am on a back country road. i was going about 30mph when all of a sudden i seen an entity dart swiftly across the road up ahead. it looked as if it was running very fast. i could not make out what it was but it appeared out of the norm and looked to have a gas blur or cloud behind it.I am a retired police officer and a trained observer and have never seen anything like this event. all of a sudden 15 seconds later we started seeing large very very bright blue lights ahead above the tree line., they were everywhere as if a police vehicle were in the road and had its lights on, but as we continued to drive there was absolutely no police car or any other vehicle in sight just us. all of a sudden the lights disappeared. i looked at my daughter and she looked at me in amasement and said mom did you just see that. we were stunned and nervous it was crazy. i didn't know who to report this to but wanted someone to know in case it could help with research. thank you for your time.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription: I was outside playing with my daughters when i took a picture of the sun, it looked pretty with the clouds. when i looked at the photo afterwards, that's when i noticed the object that appeared to be an ufo. i took more photos afterwards but it was gone. i didn't see this object with the naked eye, only thru the photo i took.
content.summary: I was outside playing w/my daughters when i took a picture of the sun, it looked pretty w/the clouds. when i looked at the photo afterwards, that's when i noticed the object that appeared to be an ufo. i took more photos afterwards but it was gone.
